channel.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud on a 508 server(bulby)?
channel.description: hey guys i know you need to make them talk in NPC.java but how? can someone post a code that will help me... thanks!

item.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud on a 508 server(bulby)?
item.dc:creator: @RS_Gamer001 RS Gamer001
item.description:
@RS_Gamer001 wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:2, topic:263486”]Punch them in the gut, and tell them to talk.
Holding a weapon to their head might help too.[/quote]
LOL

Jc22493:

Don’t spam; if you can’t help, don’t post at all.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud on a 508 server(bulby)?
item.dc:creator: @sethsinclair420 sethsinclair420
item.description:
@sethsinclair420 wrote:

lol um… im trying that cause im a good coder i added a random event system on my server, so my server has random events, as so far just 1 random event, gonna make more soon… and i wanna make the npcs talk out loud on the random even. so someone please help.

item.source: How do i make npcs talk out loud on a 508 server(bulby)?

item.title: How do i make npcs talk out loud on a 508 server(bulby)?
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

npcoption1.java

u will see something like this

[code]if(pnp.npcType == 6166)
{

if(p.Quests == 0)
{
p.Dialogue = 4444;
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 6166, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Sir Pelleas”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Hello.”, 241, 4);
}[/code]
so just follow that struction

Read full topic
